title: Chicken in Sweet and Sour Sauce
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '450g chicken, cut into chunks', 'Sauce', '4 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1/3 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '4 tablespoons water', '1 dessertspoon soy sauce', '1 dessertspoon HP original sauce', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 dessertspoon chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, finely sliced', '1 teaspoon salt']
